name: Inhumane Human Search
description:
Inhuman Human Search is a 2 player local multiplayer game about fitting in! most of the characters are AI, but two of them are players! the goal is to find the other player in the crowd of robots. when you hit a robot it breaks and then disappears, but if you hit a player you win!

controls:

WASD - player 1 movement

F - player 1 attack

E - player 1 distraction

←↑→↓ - player 2 movement

space - player 2 attack

enter - player 2 distraction
